sections.text:
RCW 24.46.010

Finding—Intent.

It is the finding of the legislature that foreign trade zones serve an important public purpose by the creation of employment opportunities within the state and that the establishment of zones designed to accomplish this purpose is to be encouraged. It is the further intent of the legislature that the department of commerce provide assistance to entities planning to apply to the United States for permission to establish such zones.

It is the finding of the legislature that foreign trade zones serve an important public purpose by the creation of employment opportunities within the state and that the establishment of zones designed to accomplish this purpose is to be encouraged. It is the further intent of the legislature that the department of commerce provide assistance to entities planning to apply to the United States for permission to establish such zones.

[ 2023 c 470 s 2004; 1995 c 399 s 12; 1985 c 466 s 39; 1977 ex.s. c 196 s 1.]

Explanatory statement—2023 c 470: See note following RCW 10.99.030.

sections.number: 24.46.020 - Application for permission to establish, operate
sections.text:
RCW 24.46.020

Application for permission to establish, operate and maintain foreign trade zones authorized.

A nonprofit corporation or organization, as zone sponsor, may apply to the United States for permission to establish, operate, and maintain foreign trade zones: PROVIDED, That nothing herein shall be construed to prevent these zones from being operated and financed by a private corporation(s) on behalf of said nonprofit corporation acting as zone sponsor.

A nonprofit corporation or organization, as zone sponsor, may apply to the United States for permission to establish, operate, and maintain foreign trade zones: PROVIDED, That nothing herein shall be construed to prevent these zones from being operated and financed by a private corporation(s) on behalf of said nonprofit corporation acting as zone sponsor.

[ 1977 ex.s. c 196 s 2.]

Effective date—1977 ex.s. c 196: See note following RCW 24.46.010.

Effective date—1977 ex.s. c 196: See note following RCW 24.46.010.
